free_text.Learning outcomes: The basics of mathematical reasoning, combinatorial analysis, discrete structures, algorithmic thinking and applications and modeling.
free_text.Content: A wide variety of practical relevant mathematical problems is studied and solved, thereby teaching students to think mathematically.[br/][br/]The mathematical common sense taught in this course is not only fun, it will also prove to be a valuable resource irrespective of the students' future specialization.
free_text.Type of teaching: Ex cathedra lectures and in class exercises
free_text.Note: Caution : this course is taught in English
free_text.Bibliography and material: Kenneth H. Rosen, Discrete Mathematics and its applications, fifth edition, McGraw-Hill

en.title: Discrete structures
en.library_recommends:
• "Discrete mathematics / Richard Johnsonbaugh". Year:2009. ISBN:978-0-13-135430-2
  • "Discrete mathematics and its applications / Kenneth H. Rosen". Year:2007. ISBN:0-07-331271-1

free_text.Forme d'enseignement: Ex cathedra et exercices en classe
free_text.Contenu: Une grande variété de problèmes importants en pratique est étudiée et résolue en apprenant aux étudiants à penser mathématiquement.[br/][br/]Le bons sens mathématique enseigné dans ce cours est à la fois drôle et utile, car il sera un outil indispensable quelle que soit la spécialisation choisie.
free_text.Remarque: Attention : ce cours est enseigné en Anglais
free_text.Bibliographie et matériel: Kenneth H. Rosen, Discrete Mathematics and its applications, fifth edition, McGraw-Hill
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: Les bases du raisonnement mathématique, l'analyse combinatoire, les structures discrètes, les méthodes algorithmiques, les applications et la modélisation.

fr.title: Discrete structures
fr.library_recommends:
• "Discrete mathematics / Richard Johnsonbaugh". Année:2009. ISBN:978-0-13-135430-2
  • "Discrete mathematics and its applications / Kenneth H. Rosen". Année:2007. ISBN:0-07-331271-1
